pageProduct.name: Voost Sport Orange Effervescent 10 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

VÖOST Isotonic Sport Fast Hydration Orange. Specially formulated to help support the fluid and key mineral needs of active sportspeople

VÖOST the great tasting vitamin BOOST

We're passionate about all things effervescent and we're on a mission to make vitamin supplements a bit more appealing! We're armed with the world's largest range of effervescent vitamins and minerals to help you find just the right one to suit your needs.

Simple to use. Premium formulation. Great tasting.

Sport Fast Hydration

Suitable For: Vegan Friendly

Size: 10 Tablets

Flavour: Orange

Serving Size: 1 Tablet

Servings Per Pack: 10

KEY FEATURES

• VÖOST Sport Orange Helps Support Body Electrolyte Balance
• VÖOST Sport Orange Helps Convert Carbohydrates and Fats into Energy
• VÖOST Sport Orange Helps Support Neuromuscular Function
• VÖOST Sport Orange Helps Support Muscle Function and Health
• VÖOST Sport Orange Helps Support Connective Tissue Health
• VÖOST Sport Orange Helps Support Bone Health
• No artificial colours or flavours. Formulated with Natural Stevia Sweetener.

Warnings

ALWAYS READ THE LABEL. FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS FOR USE.
Mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Adults only. Keep out of reach of children. Store tube tightly closed in a cool, dry place. Store below 25°C. Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing. When exercising vigorously, check for signs of dehydration and consume additional water as required. Natural Stevia Sweetener.

Ingredients

Glucose (as glucose & glucose-anyhdrous) 4.26 g
Potassium (as potassium phosphate- monobasic) 381 mg
Calcium (as calcium carbonate) 250 mg
Magnesium (as magnesium carbonate - light) 105 mg
Zinc (as zinc sulfate monohydrate) 3.5 mg
Iron (as ferrous gluconate dihydrate) 2 mg
Manganese (as manganese sulfate monohydrate) 1.4 mg
Contains 428 mg sodium per tablet (856 mg per maximum daily dose)
Natural Stevia Sweetener.

Contains: Contains 428 mg sodium per tablet (856 mg per maximum daily dose)

Directions

Adults: Take up to 2 tablets daily. Dissolve 1 tablet in 300 ml water, or 2 tablets in 600 ml water or as directed by your health professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store tube tightly closed in a cool, dry place. Store below 25°C. Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
